name: Testman MK Ultra infiltrates the League of Shadows IN SPACE
name_original: Testman MK Ultra infiltrates the League of Shadows IN SPACE
description:
!!! WORKS BEST IN FIREFOX !!!

What the dice mean:
Red dice are attack rolls.
Blue dice are defense rolls.
Yellow dice are saving throws. (If this is high enough, a killing blow can be survived)
Green dice are healing rolls.

Story:
In this game you play as the honorable Testman. Coming from a long line of specially trained Testmen, he has been sent into the far reaches of space to infiltrate the asteroid base of the League of Shadows to retrieve a most powerful artifact which the Galaxians plan to put to use in the construction of a diceon sphere - A space station of most drastic proportions to siphon the RNG-essence out of a nearby star, leaving it's solar system a desolate wasteland.

Now hurry, Testman! Get astride your trusty Testmech and embark on this most treacherous journey!

It is your time to be a hero!

Bonus Objective:
If you can send me screenshot proof of carrying the Galaxian Fox all the way to the end of the game alive, you'll get a cookie or so.
